name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
storyline: Amerzone: The Explorer’s Legacy beckons players to embark on an enchanting journey of exploration and discovery. Set in a mysterious Latin American realm reclaimed by nature, this remake promises to deliver a visually stunning odyssey unlike any other. Prepare to be transported to a world brimming with secrets and wonders, where every corner holds the promise of adventure. As a daring journalist fulfilling the final wishes of a legendary explorer, you’ll unravel the mysteries of Amerzone’s enigmatic past.
summary:
A full remake of a 2001 point-and-click adventure game Amerzone which served as the first game in the later-created Syberia series.

The remake is more like a reimagining of an old classic adventure with new tough puzzles and new challenges.
